Text:
The audio is distorted and the picture is quite blocky for me. Not sure if it's the source or my player, but I don't normally have audio issues no matter the display quality.

Running it on Win 8, VLC media player on stereo sound.

Agree with DrTen, pretty average quality with audio distortion and blocky picture. I have played this on Windows 7 with VLC player as well as an external media player via Television.

Couldn't get it play on my Sony S tablet, which usually has no issues. Just gave me gurgly sound and jumping picture.
